title: Twitter : top mentioned hashtags of the Oscars 2017
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of mentions on the Y-axis for 10 different Hashtagss for 2 groups Tweets, and Retweets that are presented on the X-axis.
In Hashtags #Oscars, Retweets had the highest Number of mentions 1987739.0 among the 2 groups and in #WinnerIsDJT, Tweets had the lowest Number of mentions 855.0.
In Hashtags #Oscars, Tweets had the highest Number of mentions among all 10 Hashtagss and it has the lowest Number of mentions in Hashtags #WinnerIsDJT.
Hashtags #Oscars and #WinnerIsDJT had the biggest gap of 793070.0 between the highest and lowest Number of mentions found for Tweets.

mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of mentions on the Y-axis for 10 different Hashtagss for 2 groups Tweets, and Retweets that are presented on the X-axis.
In Hashtags #Oscars, Retweets had the highest Number of mentions 1987739.0 among the 2 groups and in #WinnerIsDJT, Tweets had the lowest Number of mentions 855.0.
In Hashtags #Oscars, Tweets had the highest Number of mentions among all 10 Hashtagss and it has the lowest Number of mentions in Hashtags #WinnerIsDJT.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Hashtagss on X-axis for 2 groups Tweets, and Retweets. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of mentions.
Hashtags #Oscars had the maximum Number of mentions among all 2 groups, and it was for Retweets. The minimum Number of mentions was observed in Hashtags #WinnerIsDJT for Tweets.
Among all the Hashtagss, Tweets had the highest Number of mentions in Hashtags #Oscars and lowest Number of mentions in Hashtags #WinnerIsDJT.
The maximum Number of mentions for Tweets that was found in Hashtags #Oscars was 928.57 times larger than the minimum Number of mentions observed in Hashtags #WinnerIsDJT.
Among all 2 groups, Tweets had the gap of 793070.0 between the maximum and minimum Number of mentions observed in Hashtags #Oscars and #WinnerIsDJT respectively.
Averaging all 2 groups Tweets, and Retweets, the Hashtags #Oscars is the maximum Number of mentions and #OSCARS is the minimum Number of mentions.
